data.text:
@richieSF2016 They need to lift ALL MANDATES and the vaxxxx requirement IMMEDIATELY.
And enforcing federal laws would be nice.

@richieSF2016 I recall NYC in the late 80’s/early 90’s- they did a massive cleanup.  However, that was due to policies most SF politicians will not push - more police with a high conviction rate for even small crimes, removed homeless, cracked down on open air drug trafficking, etc.

@lolalovessf @richieSF2016 They need to do #5 first. Not a single person  will believe things will get better until they actually make it happen. Even tax-free is not incentive enough to deal with the current plague.
@BayAreaForMAGA @richieSF2016 For California to heal and restore itself, all three need to go.
@richieSF2016 Breed, Newsom, Pelosi. It is one unit. When bad things happen, it’s on all of them.

@richieSF2016 Unfortunately City Hall is making too much money for themselves off all the federal money from the homeless. Plus all the votes they pull from the homeless population. They’re war on the internal combustion engine hurts, also. Want build parking.
@richieSF2016 I have downtown businesses and we received absolutely zero help. They even came back at us to charge us fees for outdoor while we were closed for the year. Absolutely incompetent
@richieSF2016 in breed has a better chance of winning the lottery than getting businesses to return rn! 😂😂
